title: Greetings of Marco Impagliazzo to UN Secretary General Ban Ki-Moon visiting the Community of Sant'Egidio ...
text: ( Source : Comunit√† di S Egidio ) Mr. Secretary General , Welcome to Sant'egidio!It is an honor and a joy to welcome you in our house after so many years of close and active cooperation with the United Nations for peace, hospitality to
